# Abstract

vscode terminal icon abnormal, shown as box.to fix this problem we nedd to set this `font family` as the terminal font.

# Referance

[texthttps://arch.icekylin.online/advanced/beauty-3.html#\_2-1-powerlevel10k](https://https://arch.icekylin.online/advanced/beauty-3.html#_2-1-powerlevel10k)

check the terminal font

ksonl --> 设置 --> 管理配色方案 --> 外观 --> font

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fly-t/images/main/blog/index-2023-01-08-14-52-57.png)

set the font same as terminal

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fly-t/images/main/blog/index-2023-01-08-14-37-40.png)

then you will see successful

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fly-t/images/main/blog/index-2023-01-08-14-53-28.png)
